definition: basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
Tarim Basin depression in southern Xinjiang
the Yili basin around Urumqi in Xinjiang
four great basin depressions of China, namely: Tarim 塔里木盆地 in south Xinjiang, Jungar 準葛爾盆地|准葛尔盆地 and Tsaidam or Qaidam 柴達木盆地|柴达木盆地 in north Xinjiang Sichuan 四川盆地
Yanqi basin in northeast of Tarim basin
the Ferghana Valley in modern Uzbekistan
pinyin: Fei4 er3 gan4 na4 Pen2 di4

sentences.english: Foreland basins are the key areas for the study of orogeny.
sentences.chinese: 前陆盆地是研究造山运动的关键地区之一。

sentences.english: This method can be applied in rifted basin with abundant effusive rocks.
sentences.chinese: 该方法在喷出岩较发育的断陷盆地中可以广泛应用。

sentences.english: The paper also discusses the structural evolution history of the forel…
sentences.chinese: 并讨论了龙门山中段中生代前陆盆地的构造演化历史。

sentences.english: Niujuanhu oilfield is located in Santanhu basin, with complicated geology conditions.
sentences.chinese: 地处三塘湖盆地的牛圈湖油田，地质条件比较复杂。

sentences.english: Making new progress on the research for foreland basin is outlined.
sentences.chinese: 简述了国外前陆盆地研究的新进展。

sentences.english: The Paleogene source rock in Jinhu depression, Subei basin, is characterized by "shallow maturation".
sentences.chinese: 苏北盆地金湖凹陷古近系烃源岩具有“浅熟”特征。

sentences.english: In the second part, nine characteristics of local structures in northern Jiang-Su Basin are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分概括论述了苏北盆地局部构造的九点特征。

sentences.english: In the Past , Au - bearing character was never researched to Jiao-Lai basin.
sentences.chinese: 胶莱盆地含金性前人未作研究。

sentences.english: Songliao Basin is a expanding and rifted basin which was formed in Mesozoic era.
sentences.chinese: 松辽盆地是一中生代形成的伸展裂陷盆地。

sentences.chinese: 松辽盆地是一中生代形成的伸展裂陷盆地。

sentences.english: The exploitation of natural gas and gas water in Sichuan Basin has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 四川盆地天然气和气田水开发历史悠久。

sentences.english: Mesozoic faults at the eastern margin of the Songliao Basin were well developed.
sentences.chinese: 松辽盆地东缘中生代断裂构造十分发育。

sentences.english: Present-day Species Of Piranha Resulted From Marine Incursion Into Amazon Basin.
sentences.chinese: 现代水虎是海水入侵亚马逊盆地的结果”。

sentences.english: Nanyang Basin was abundant in stone resource.
sentences.chinese: 南阳盆地周围有取之不尽的石材资源。

sentences.english: Yongdeng sag's exploration degree is lower, which is main body of deposition and hydrocarbon source in this area.
